_1: ^Thank goodness you're here! Boy, am I glad to see you.
^Can you take me to 1100 Flower Blvd? The one by the park?
^My boyfriend was supposed to pick me up so we could go together, but he said some emergency came up.
^This isn't the first time this has happened...
^...but he's been so sweet to me so I can't be too mad at him.
^It hasn't been too long, but things feel new and exciting.
^Who knows, maybe he'll stick around for a while.
^Better than the others by a long shot.
^You know, I had to run all the way to your taxi in heels! Really works up a sweat.
^I abs-o-lutely can't miss Kim's party! I'm already running behind as is.
^I spent a lot of time on my hair and makeup today.
^He's not here to appreciate it, but at least you can.
^Well, doesn't hurt to show up fashionably late.
^There's only so much to do in this town. Gotta make the most of my youth or something like that, right?

c-0: ^I can't spend all my days working.
^A girl's gotta have fun every now and then!
^I'm trying to work a little less. I used to work way more when I was still at the diner...
^Now I'm at the bridal boutique on 5th. Every day feels so dreamy!
^Everyone who walks in looks like a princess.
^Makes me wonder about my big day, too...whenever that'll be.
c-1: ^Hmm...I just wanna live my life to the fullest, you know?
^I feel a little more free since I left the diner.
^I used to spend so much time there, all my days were starting to feel like they were blurring together!
^I can't say I enjoyed it, but the money was decent. I got nice tips.
^At some point, I couldn't stand it anymore and left!
^Now that I'm working at the bridal boutique on 5th, every day feels so dreamy!
^I've got more to worry about now, but I'm happy and having fun!

p1: ^Been here all my life. Know everyone there is to know.
^Haven't seen you around here for a while, but welcome back I guess.
^You probably don't remember me, but I was in the year below you.
^I would see you hanging out by the gas station after school all the time with that one pretty girlie.
^I used to think you two were those cool kids who didn't care about a thing.
^Don't worry, I think you're still pretty cool!
^I'm Julie, by the way. Been back long?

c-0: ^Ahh, c'mon, give me more than that! Where've you been?
^It's not that often someone gets outta here.
^We don't get a lot of taxi drivers out here either, so it's nice that you're here.
^Especially when your boyfriend's car breaks down for the umpteenth time this month.
c-1: ^Ahh, c'mon, give me more than that! Where've you been?
^It's not often someone gets outta here.
^Well, I do like a man with an air of mystery.
^Just kidding, don't get the wrong idea now!
^I think <glitch>someone else</glitch> has your heart right now anyways, right?
c-2: ^I get it, man. I'll let you do your thing.
^Not much of a talker, huh? That's fine.

p2: ^Say...do you ever feel like you're running out of time?

c-0: ^Maybe we're more alike than I thought. But...

p3: ^I'm sure you've been doing this for a while. Doing fine for yourself and all.
^There's so many people my age that are done with school...
^...got good jobs lined up, or even have kids!
^I want nothing more than to have a life like that, but...
^I keep hopping from job to job.
^It's been a long time since I've been in school.
^I keep saying I'm planning to go back...
^...but it's becoming harder to convince myself it's ever gonna happen.
^I just don't know what I'm doing wrong.
^Especially with the news of <glitch>her passing</glitch> last year.
^You know she was just a little older than me?
^Well, of course you knew. What am I saying...
^I'd rather not speak about this anymore.

c-0: ^Sorry, sorry...didn't mean to rant at you.
^Life's just getting to me, is all...
c-1: ^Sorry. I didn't mean to dig up old wounds.
^I know how you must have <glitch>felt about her</glitch>...
^Life's just getting to me, is all...
c-2: ^Sorry...life's just getting to me, is all...

p4: ^I don't mean to get all gloomy on you.
^I think I just want to try enjoying life a little more.

c-0: ^That's true. Maybe I'm getting ahead of myself.
^Just gotta take it one day at a time, right?
c-2: ^Well, I've ranted enough to you now.

p5: ^Maybe it's time I get outta here too.
^Mackenzie, I mean. Though I guess my stop's coming up too, isn't it...

b: ^Thanks again for the ride...and for listening to me.
^I appreciate it, really. More than you know.
^If you see me around, don't be a stranger now!
